WorkItem.Description:
Currently, it is possible to sort items by:
- Overall
- Alphabetical
- Survival
- Mitigation
- Threat
Â 
But "Overall" contains Survival, Mitigation AND Threat. 
I agree to this, but often I'd like a new item which only contains Survival and Mitigation, because Threat, even if it's necessary for tanking, is not a "protection" stat if you see what I mean.
Therefore "Overall" sorting does not reflect this if Threat is added to Survival and Mitigation, and items are not sorted as I would like so.
WorkItem.Summary: [Tanking] Items sorted by Survivability / Mitigation / Threat

Comments.Message: I understand what you are looking for.  I would suggest going to the options tab and setting Threat Weight = 0.  Keeping the sorting by Overall, but with all threat numbers = 0, means that you'll have things ranked as you describe.  I realize that not all of the Tank models have a Threat Weight style option, so I speak for TankDK in this case.
Pretty sure they all have a threat weight option of some sort. I wouldn't recommend putting it at 0 though, just set it as low as you find it valuable. It definitely still has some value.

Thank you very much ! 
Exactly what I expected :)
But why had I to put Threat value at (for example) 1.0 instead of 0.0 (aka None)  ?

In fact I realize I would like more than that for the "Sort" parameter :
- If Survival is selected, then only Survival bars are displayed. I would like to keep this sort, but also adding the Mitigation bars on right side (but not sorted, of course).
- The same thing for Mitigation sort : Sort by Mitigation first, then add Survival on the right side of the bars.
- And for Overall (since I can remove Threat), keep the current sort : Mitigation + Survival.

What do you think about ?
If I'm understanding you correctly, that's exactly how it does work (at least in Rawr2, that may not work yet in Rawr3).
